issue.title: "Resource type" relation does not use the configured label and tooltip
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

"Resource type" relation does not use the configured label and tooltip.
A genereic text was added here: https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/repository/revisions/7527/diff/sandboxes/depth/running/hvh/4.2.x/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_catalog/src/site/libraries/easysdi/FormGenerator.php

But we should use the backcend config values:
!resource-type-relation.png!



**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
